p.s: For image t show up, you may need to start path with a slash before, Assets.
You may also need to change image file name, to have a dash zero, one.
For phone apps, need the hardware button pressed, remember phones have thier own back button.
Look close at Udemy's code in 3.9, List part 3.
Not only does it have mediaCapture, i e camera integration, but may also have the observable collection code.
